resources.string: One of its kind theme park in asia
An underwater tunnel with a sea of marine life swimming above and around you.
SkyPark offers a taste of the highlife by viewing Singapore
This sprawling garden in the city provides mesmerising waterfront views across three gardens, spanning over 101 hectares of reclaimed land.
Head to the Night Safari for an after dark visit to the weird and wonderful creatures of the night
Enjoy close interactions with a kaleidoscope of birds at feeding sessions and be tickled by their show-stopping antics in thrilling bird shows.
One Michelin Star Summer Pavilion offers an intimate and sophisticated Cantonese dining experience.
Serves refined Chinese food with contemporary techniques and elegant surroundings in Paragon in Orchard, Singapore
Offers contemporary European cuisine and city panoramas
Solid, Indian fine dining in Singapore
The best Italian restaurant in Singapore,
Celebrity chef\'s American steakhouse with a sleek bar and lounge
Suntec City dazzles with a curated mix of retail stores comprising of high street fashion, lifestyle.
Orchard Road, a 2.2 kilometre-long boulevard, is the retail and entertainment hub of Singapore
The Shoppes at Marina Bay Sands(R) is one of Singapore\'s largest luxury shopping malls
VivoCity is the largest shopping mall in Singapore.
Most famous Japanese department store on Orchard Rd delivering high quality and exclusive designer fashion
With shops from Bugis Street and beyond, you are spoiled for choice
Raffles Hotel is a colonial-style luxury hotel
The 5-star Pan Pacific Singapore provides direct access to Marina Square Mall and Suntec Convention Centre.
The Ritz-Carlton, Millenia Singapore is a 5-minute walk from the Singapore Flyer and Marina Square Shopping
It features an outdoor pool, pampering spa treatments and a 24-hour fitness centre. Complimentary WiFi access is available at the lobby daily.
In the heart of the shopping district, the Holiday Inn Express Singapore Orchard Road features modern, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi.
